Text: Being a tribal people, the Shanyue are unused to the urban and decadent cities of the Han and prefer a life in encamped in the wilderness. Although not nomadic, the hill tribes are nevertheless a more pastoral, agricultural peoples. \\n\\n From their camps, they can both tend to their needs as a people and prepare themselves, militarily, for the ever-present and increasing threat of invasion from the North.
All: 山越部落与汉人习俗不同，他们并不习惯于居住在高屋建瓴的城镇当中，而是习惯于住在帐篷里。他们并不是游牧民族，而是以农业为生，过着田园牧歌一般的生活。\\n\\n帐篷既能满足山越之民们的生活需求，也能让他们有效地为来自北部日益严重的入侵威胁作好准备。
Old: 山越部落与汉人习俗不同，他们并不习惯于居住在高屋建瓴的城镇当中，而是习惯于住在帐篷里。他们并不是游牧民族，而是以农业为生，过着田园牧歌一般的生活。\\n\\n帐篷既能满足山越之民们的生活需求，也能让他们有效地为来自北部日益严重的入侵威胁作好准备。
Vanilla: 山越部落与汉人习俗不同，他们并不习惯于居住在高屋建瓴的城镇当中，而是习惯于住在帐篷里。他们并不是游牧民族，而是以农业为生，过着田园牧歌一般的生活。\\n\\n帐篷既能满足山越之民们的生活需求，也能让他们有效地为来自北部日益严重的入侵威胁作好准备。
Exact: 山越部落与汉人习俗不同，他们并不习惯于居住在高屋建瓴的城镇当中，而是习惯于住在帐篷里。他们并不是游牧民族，而是以农业为生，过着田园牧歌一般的生活。\\n\\n帐篷既能满足山越之民们的生活需求，也能让他们有效地为来自北部日益严重的入侵威胁作好准备。

Text: The Southlands have long been the home of the Shanyue tribes, and it is their ardent hope that it always will be. This is the truth by which they live, and one they must fight to protect as warlords begin to encroach. \\n\\n The Shanyue know the hills of the South better than any, and amidst the striking scenery, their fortresses rise: places to live and grow, away from both the extremities of the elements and the eyes of the enemy.
All: 江南一带长久以来一直是山越之民的故乡，他们对这片土地怀有深厚的感情。如今野心勃勃的诸侯们要蚕食他们祖辈所居之地，他们必须拿起武器，以奋战保卫故土。\\n\\n山越之民比汉人更熟悉江南的丘陵地形，他们将自己的堡垒建立在群山中最险要的地方。他们可以在远离天灾人祸的地方安居乐业。
Old: 江南一带长久以来一直是山越之民的故乡，他们对这片土地怀有深厚的感情。如今野心勃勃的诸侯们要蚕食他们祖辈所居之地，他们必须拿起武器，以奋战保卫故土。\\n\\n山越之民比汉人更熟悉江南的丘陵地形，他们将自己的堡垒建立在群山中最险要的地方。他们可以在远离天灾人祸的地方安居乐业。
Exact: 江南一带长久以来一直是山越之民的故乡，他们对这片土地怀有深厚的感情。如今野心勃勃的诸侯们要蚕食他们祖辈所居之地，他们必须拿起武器，以奋战保卫故土。\\n\\n山越之民比汉人更熟悉江南的丘陵地形，他们将自己的堡垒建立在群山中最险要的地方。他们可以在远离天灾人祸的地方安居乐业。

Text: These military supplies were pillaged after a successful siege.

Text: %n Siege Towers per item (at siege escalation)
[[b]]CHARGE RESISTANCE[[/b]]\\n\\n Determines how solidly this unit can withstand enemy charges. Only functions when the unit is braced.
All: [[b]]冲锋抵抗力[[/b]]\\n\\n决定该部队能承受多大程度的敌军冲锋。此作用于该单位被冲锋时。
Mapped by text: [[b]]冲锋抵抗力[[/b]]\\n\\n决定该部队能承受多大程度的敌军冲锋。此作用于该单位被冲锋时。

Text: Fire Resistance: %d%%||Damage of flaming attacks is reduced by this amount.

Exact: 火焰抗性：％d %% ||降低火焰造成的伤害数值。

Text: Inflicts less damage and has reduced accuracy but suppresses targets.
All: 造成伤害较低，准确率也降低，但可压制目标。
Mapped by text: 造成伤害较低，准确率也降低，但可压制目标。

Text: [[b]]BONUS VS. INFANTRY[[/b]]\\n\\n Increases melee damage against infantry.
All: [[b]]对抗步兵加成[[/b]]\\n\\n提高对步兵的近战伤害。
Mapped by text: [[b]]对抗步兵加成[[/b]]\\n\\n提高对步兵的近战伤害。

Text: [[b]]BONUS VS. CAVALRY[[/b]]\\n\\n Increases melee damage against cavalry.
All: [[b]]对抗骑兵加成[[/b]]\\n\\n提高对骑兵的近战伤害。
Mapped by text: [[b]]对抗骑兵加成[[/b]]\\n\\n提高对骑兵的近战伤害。

Text: [[b]]MELEE HIT BONUS[[/b]]\\n\\n Increases a unit's hit chance at all times by decreasing the enemy's melee evasion.
All: [[b]]近战命中加成[[/b]]\\n\\n通过降低敌人的近战回避，增加单位在任何时候的命中率。
Mapped by text: [[b]]近战命中加成[[/b]]\\n\\n通过降低敌人的近战回避，增加单位在任何时候的命中率。

Text: [[b]]MELEE EVASION[[/b]]\\n\\n Increases the chance of evading melee damage from front and side. The enemy's charge bonus decreases it.
All: [[b]]近战回避[[/b]]\\n\\n此能力值会提高闪避正面与侧面近战伤害的机率。敌人的冲锋加成会降低此能力值。
Mapped by text: [[b]]近战回避[[/b]]\\n\\n此能力值会提高闪避正面与侧面近战伤害的机率。敌人的冲锋加成会降低此能力值。

Text: [[b]]ARMOUR[[/b]]\\n\\n Decreases standard melee, ranged and explosion damages. Doesn't help against armour-piercing damage.
All: [[b]]护甲[[/b]]\\n\\n减少单位受到的标准近战伤害、远程伤害以及爆炸伤害。无法防御穿甲伤害。
Mapped by text: [[b]]护甲[[/b]]\\n\\n减少单位受到的标准近战伤害、远程伤害以及爆炸伤害。无法防御穿甲伤害。

Text: Each character in Sun Ce's faction grants him shared expertise points once they reach rank 5. At ranks 9, 12 and 15 they generate one extra point respectively.
All: 孙策派系中每位人物在达到5级后均会与他分享专长点。在9级、12级和15级时他们分别会产生一个额外的点数。

Text: The yellow turban warband is crushed. Hailing from Qingzhou, the survivors offer their servitude. Cao Cao gathers them under his banner and dubs them Qingzhou Troops.

Text: It's hard to believe, but it might be worth investigating personally.
All: 难以置信，但不妨亲自调查一番。
Mapped by text: 难以置信，但不妨亲自调查一番。

Text: There's a rumor about a nearby village. Each night, a huge monster terrorises the peasants. The villagers seek a hero to comb the mountains and drive out the beast.
All: 附近村庄有传闻说，每晚会有巨兽出没恐吓农民。村民们在找寻一位英雄来进山驱走怪兽。
Override by key: 附近村庄有传闻说，每晚会有巨兽出没恐吓农民。村民们在找寻一位英雄来进山驱走怪兽。

Text: You agree with your men and prepare to descend.
All: 你同意下人的意见，准备下山。
Mapped by text: 你同意下人的意见，准备下山。

Text: A few days after you and your men began searching the mountains, you come across an incredible sight. The den of a large white tiger and its family. The men are intimidated by its size and implore you to go back. You feel as if the massive tiger is staring at you.
All: 在您与部下开始搜山几天后，您遇到了一个不可思议的景象：一只巨型白虎的巢穴。您的部下被老虎体型吓到，恳求您回去。您感觉好像那只巨大的老虎正在盯着你。
Override by key: 在您与部下开始搜山几天后，您遇到了一个不可思议的景象：一只巨型白虎的巢穴。您的部下被老虎体型吓到，恳求您回去。您感觉好像那只巨大的老虎正在盯着你。

Text: After an epic struggle, you slay the enormous white tiger. Then, unexpectedly, the other tigers prostrate themselves as if submitting to your might! These white tigers don't seem to be ordinary beasts.
All: 酣战之后，您杀死了巨型白虎。然而出乎意料的是，其它老虎俯伏在您身前，好像屈服于您的力量！这些白虎似乎不是普通的野兽。
Override by key: 酣战之后，您杀死了巨型白虎。然而出乎意料的是，其它老虎俯伏在您身前，好像屈服于您的力量！这些白虎似乎不是普通的野兽。

Text: You give up the hunt and return. However, for reasons unknown, the monster attacks stopped.
All: 您放弃了狩猎，回去了。然而不知为何，怪兽从此不再攻击。
Mapped by text: 您放弃了狩猎，回去了。然而不知为何，怪兽从此不再攻击。

Text: It's best to ignore these annoying preachers.
All: 不应理睬这些烦人的布道僧侣。
Mapped by text: 不应理睬这些烦人的布道僧侣。

Text: A group of unusual men sporting shaved heads disembark from a ship.  They claim to have journeyed from distant lands to spread the teachings of Buddha. Perhaps it will be worth supporting them?
All: 从船上下来一群剃光头的异人。他们自称从遥远地方来此传播佛道。也许值得支持他们？
Mapped by text: 从船上下来一群剃光头的异人。他们自称从遥远地方来此传播佛道。也许值得支持他们？

Text: This age of strife breeds men with a talent for warfare. A follower who has recently joined the faction can assume the role of managing an exclusive unit.
All: 乱世出豪杰。新进的一名随从可管理一只特殊军队。
Mapped by text: 乱世出豪杰。新进的一名随从可管理一只特殊军队。

Text: Sogdians from the west has been spotted entering our borders. We will be able to purchase fine goods or hire Sogd mercenaries soon.
All: 自西域而来的粟特商人出现在我方境内。我们很快就能买到精美商品，或者雇佣粟特佣兵。
Mapped by text: 自西域而来的粟特商人出现在我方境内。我们很快就能买到精美商品，或者雇佣粟特佣兵。

Text: Indeed, the goods brought by the western merchants are diverse, with many rare and valuable items. Furthermore, the mercenaries escorting them look like natural warriors.
All: 的确，西域商人带来的货物种类繁多，其中不乏珍惜名贵之物。而且，护送他们的佣兵看起来就像是天生的战士。
Mapped by text: 的确，西域商人带来的货物种类繁多，其中不乏珍惜名贵之物。而且，护送他们的佣兵看起来就像是天生的战士。

Text: You decide not to avail yourself of their wares.
All: 你决定不买他们的货品。
Mapped by text: 你决定不买他们的货品。

Text: You are rather taken with a peculiar sword.
All: 您被一柄怪剑吸引住了。
Mapped by text: 您被一柄怪剑吸引住了。

Text: You are rather taken with a fine steed.
All: 您被一匹好马吸引住了。
Mapped by text: 您被一匹好马吸引住了。

Text: You hire a Sogdian mercenary group.
All: 您雇佣了一队粟特佣兵。
Mapped by text: 您雇佣了一队粟特佣兵。

Text: Your messengers report a remarkable story. A trader spotted a Han woman living amongst the Xiongnu and identified her as Cai Yan, the daughter of the grand scholar Cai Yong. It seems she was forced to marry a chieftain of the Xiongnu. Perhaps someone could convince this chieftain to free Cai Yan. One of your scouts has already left to investigate...
All: 信使来报，有商贩在匈奴营中发现一位中土女眷，正是名士蔡邕之女蔡琰，已沦为匈奴左贤王女奴。匈奴王或许愿意放了蔡琰，你的一个探子已经前去调查……
Override by key: 信使来报，有商贩在匈奴营中发现一位中土女眷，正是名士蔡邕之女蔡琰，已沦为匈奴左贤王女奴。匈奴王或许愿意放了蔡琰，你的一个探子已经前去调查……

Text: We have contacted the Xiongnu and verified that the kidnapped woman is indeed Cai Yan. She has become the concubine of a Xiongnu chieftain. However, the Xiongnu offer to release Cai Yan for a significant sum of gold.
All: 吾人已与匈奴联系，被绑架的女子确为已被匈奴王纳为小妾的蔡琰。匈奴提议，可以重金将此女赎回。
Mapped by text: 吾人已与匈奴联系，被绑架的女子确为已被匈奴王纳为小妾的蔡琰。匈奴提议，可以重金将此女赎回。

Text: You do not make deals with barbarians.
Cai Yan is free once more.
A Xiliang colonel has joined your faction.

Mapped by text: 一名西凉校尉加入您的派系。

Mapped by text: 您现在可以招募：西凉部队

Text: Chunyu Qiong finally came to his senses! He is no longer a drunkard but a general who can lead an army.

Mapped by text: 淳于琼终于想通了！他不再是个酒鬼，而是个能带兵的将领。

Text: Following your recent success, the captain of the Northern Army has come to pledge his devotion to you. He brings with him the might of the professional soldiers he commands.

Text: A shabby warband requests to join your faction. After Lu Bu's defeat, his daughter Lu Ji seems to have been leading the survivors. However, granting them sanctuary may cause their enemies to come after us.
All: 一只残军请求加入您的派系。吕布战败后，其女吕姬收拢溃卒。然而，接纳他们可能会惹恼吕布之敌。

Text: The path to prominence in these turbulent times is by the sword! Win battles to demonstrate your capability.
All: 在此动荡之秋，要想出人头地就只有靠刀剑！赢得战斗便能展示您的能力。
Mapped by text: 在此动荡之秋，要想出人头地就只有靠刀剑！赢得战斗便能展示您的能力。

Text: Wars are a costly endeavour and one cannot hope to end this chaos without a sizable treasury. Show all under heaven that you possess China's wealth.
All: 兴师十万，日费千金。国用不足则不能平乱。掌控举国之财，而后昭示天下。
Mapped by text: 兴师十万，日费千金。国用不足则不能平乱。掌控举国之财，而后昭示天下。

Text: Cement your rule with legitimacy! Build an Imperial City that will be the envy of other warlords. All under heaven will look to you for leadership.
All: 要称霸就要有正统的名义。若能建造一座万人敬仰的都城，便可彰显实力，天下人必当归顺。

Text: All economic activities have been hampered by the minting of a new coin. We have no choice but to wait for merchants to adjust to the new standard.
All: 所有的经济活动都因为新币的铸造而受到阻碍。我们别无选择，只能等待商人们适应新的标准。
Mapped by text: 所有的经济活动都因为新币的铸造而受到阻碍。我们别无选择，只能等待商人们适应新的标准。

Text: We've run into problems purchasing grain with the new coin. We have no choice but to wait for farmers to adjust to the new standard.
All: 由于新币发行，买粮时出现问题。我们别无选择，只能等到农民们适应新的标准。
Mapped by text: 由于新币发行，买粮时出现问题。我们别无选择，只能等到农民们适应新的标准。

Text: We've run into problems paying the troops with the new coin. We have no choice but to wait for soldiers to adjust to the new standard.
All: 由于新币发行，分发军饷时出现问题。我们别无选择，只能等到士兵们适应新的标准。
Mapped by text: 由于新币发行，分发军饷时出现问题。我们别无选择，只能等到士兵们适应新的标准。

Text: Completing these missions will gather northern colonels to your cause.
All: 完成这些任务，北军校尉就会为您效力。
Mapped by text: 完成这些任务，北军校尉就会为您效力。

Text: None of the other warlords in China are as noble or accomplished as you are. Bring order to chaos and officers who were once loyal to the Han Dynasty will flock to your banner. Defeat your rivals and accumulate wealth to expand your power.
All: 天下大乱，雄豪并起。主公若能运筹演谋，鞭挞宇内，忠于汉室之能人必来投效。以公之神武明哲而辅以大顺，何向而不济！
Override by key: 天下大乱，雄豪并起。主公若能运筹演谋，鞭挞宇内，忠于汉室之能人必来投效。以公之神武明哲而辅以大顺，何向而不济！

Text: Complete missions to bolster your faction!
All: 完成任务可以增强您的势力！
Mapped by text: 完成任务可以增强您的势力！

Text: Lu Bu's army follows your faction.
Yuan Shu's army follows your faction.
Enabling the people to nourish their living and mourn their dead, without any feeling against any, is the first step of the rule of virtue.
All: 使人民能够安居乐业与死得其所，无所纷争，是为王道政治的第一步。
Old: 使人民能够安居乐业与死得其所，无所纷争，是为王道政治的第一步。
Exact: 使人民能够安居乐业与死得其所，无所纷争，是为王道政治的第一步。

Text: [[b]]%+n%[[/b]] income from looting settlements and post-battle loot
A New Era, A New Ruler.

After centuries, the old Han Dynasty has finally lost the Mandate of Heaven. Yet the people under heaven still suffer from the chaos of war brought by petty warlords and their false claims to the Mandate. My Lord, you must end this. China awaits a ruler who will bring unity and prosperity to the realm. How will you choose to rule the people of China?
All: 经过数个世代，汉王朝失其天命。然而，天下黎民仍饱受各地宣称带有天命的军阀，所带来的战乱之苦。主公，您必须终结乱世。天下正等待新的治理规则引导新的团结繁荣与太平盛​​世。您将如何选择，治里天下众生？
Old: 经过数个世代，汉王朝失其天命。然而，天下黎民仍饱受各地宣称带有天命的军阀，所带来的战乱之苦。主公，您必须终结乱世。天下正等待新的治理规则引导新的团结繁荣与太平盛​​世。您将如何选择，治里天下众生？

Text: China will be ruled by virtue
All: 天下将以王道主义来治理。
Old: 天下将以王道主义来治理。
Exact: 天下将以王道主义来治理。

Text: China will be ruled by might
All: 天下将以霸道主义来治理。
Old: 天下将以霸道主义来治理。
Exact: 天下将以霸道主义来治理。

Text: You are the only one who can bring lasting peace to China. Everyone must obey your will.
All: 您是唯一能让天下回归太平之人。众人将服从您的意志。

Text: [[b]]Hou Jinting[[/b]]\\nBrilliant Matriarch\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]The stakes are raised on the fringes of the empire; Hou Jinting’s keen intuition and vigilance safeguards the future of her family.[[/col]][[/i]]

Text: [[b]]Lü Ji[[/b]]\\nDaughter of the Dragon\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_wood}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Much is expected from the Warrior Without Equal’s daughter, but the ravishing Lü Ji fights with both the skill and ferocity to live up to the Lü name.[[/col]][[/i]]

Text: [[b]]Fortitude[[/b]] is this faction's unique resource.\\n\\n[[i]][[col:flavour]] With bravery and discipline, Liu Chong inspires his men and puts fear into the enemies of the imperial palace. [[/col]][[/i]] \\n\\n

Pike Wall - Ji Guards of the Eight Talents
Pike Wall - Ji Guards of the Eight Talents

Text: Whether through hooking, or hacking, axes have a unique ability to reduce the effectiveness of shields.

Old: 不管是用钩还是砍，斧头都是对付盾牌的利器。

Text: Whilst all Yellow Turban warriors are happy to wade into the heart of battle, the Gallants of the People were made to hold the frontline against enemies - to be anywhere else would be to waste their talent and ardour. \\n\\n They are heavily-armoured, though not as heavily plated as some other warriors, yet with great axe they are able to push back the advancing foe whilst deflecting blows. Where their mail may falter, their fanaticism never will.
All: 黄巾军志士个个不怕冲锋陷阵，但是护民勇士尤其适合固守阵线，要是挪作他用可就浪费了他们一身的本领和热忱。\\n\\n他们身披重甲，也许不若其他铁甲兵士防御周全，但可仰赖手中长枪盾牌抵挡敌军、化解攻势。正所谓甲胄可破，斗志不渝。
Old: 黄巾军志士个个不怕冲锋陷阵，但是护民勇士尤其适合固守阵线，要是挪作他用可就浪费了他们一身的本领和热忱。\\n\\n他们身披重甲，也许不若其他铁甲兵士防御周全，但可仰赖手中长枪盾牌抵挡敌军、化解攻势。正所谓甲胄可破，斗志不渝。

Text: Bravery drives a warrior to battle more effectively than any general; a great axe keeps them there.
All: 勇气是最好的将领，能带领士兵踏上沙场。良斧在手，则能让士兵在沙场存活。
Mapped by text: 勇气是最好的将领，能带领士兵踏上沙场。良斧在手，则能让士兵在沙场存活。

Text: These concerned citizens call themselves the Bringers of Righteousness and have used their wealth to purchase their own armour and weapons. Each has undertaken extensive training to become proficient using polearms and learned how to use a bow through traditional archery competitions. \\n\\n Though they wear expensive tunics, their commitment is not mere vainglory; their not-inconsiderable skill with the bow and polearm make them extremely useful due to their flexibility, and therefore welcomed to join the fight for the Great Peace.
All: 这些百姓自称布义军，他们自费购进装甲与武器。他们饱经训练，能熟练地使用戟，也在传统的射术比试中习得了弓术。\\n\\n虽然他们衣着光鲜，但志向却绝非虚荣卖弄，他们灵活矫健，使弓和戟的本事不容小觑，此等义士若能加入太平大业，定是再好不过。
Old: 这些百姓自称布义军，他们自费购进装甲与武器。他们饱经训练，能熟练地使用戟，也在传统的射术比试中习得了弓术。\\n\\n虽然他们衣着光鲜，但志向却绝非虚荣卖弄，他们灵活矫健，使弓和戟的本事不容小觑，此等义士若能加入太平大业，定是再好不过。

Text: Skilled militia armed with polearms and bows, a flexible and effective unit for combat both close and from afar.
All: 装备了戟和弓箭的民间义士，对于近身作战和远程滋扰都很擅长
Old: 装备了戟和弓箭的民间义士，对于近身作战和远程滋扰都很擅长

Text: Where the militia of the Han are pressed into service out of obligation, the Yellow Turban zealots rise to fight because it is the only way to carve a better future for the people. \\n\\n Their fierce determination makes them more effective than standard militia. They charge into battle, lightly-armoured and equipped with explosive materials, ready to rend asunder any who doubt or question the Way.
All: 汉代的民兵往往是被迫服役的，但黄巾战士们确实真心实意为天下苍生而战。\\n\\n 这种坚决的意志使他们比一般的民兵更为勇猛。他们身着轻甲，手持阔剑，毫不留情地斩杀一切与黄天为敌之人。
Old: 汉代的民兵往往是被迫服役的，但黄巾战士们确实真心实意为天下苍生而战。\\n\\n 这种坚决的意志使他们比一般的民兵更为勇猛。他们身着轻甲，手持阔剑，毫不留情地斩杀一切与黄天为敌之人。
Vanilla: 汉代的民兵往往是被迫服役的，但黄巾战士们确实真心实意为天下苍生而战。\\n\\n 这种坚决的意志使他们比一般的民兵更为勇猛。他们身着轻甲，手持阔剑，毫不留情地斩杀一切与黄天为敌之人。

Text: Their own lives are not important, and they will somehow stop the enemy.
All: 不顾己命也要阻挡敌人。
Mapped by text: 不顾己命也要阻挡敌人。

Text: The role of these troops can be deduced from their appearance; their armour pieces are mismatched, put together by collecting those left in the aftermath of battle, or sourced from nearby villages. \\n\\n Their most important function is to search and collect loot, weapons and armour after the battle to put towards the Great Peace. They are not good at close combat, so they use a bunch of captured repeating crossbows to support frontline.
All: 从这些部队的外观就不难推测他们是干什么的，他们的盔甲要么是从战场上拾捡拼凑而来，要么是从周围村落里搞来的。\\n\\n他们最重要的作用是在战后搜集战利品、武器以及盔甲，从而推进太平大业。他们配有长矛和盾牌用以自卫，有时会被拉去充数，但是基本没什么打仗的本事，稍有交兵便作鸟兽散。
Old: 从这些部队的外观就不难推测他们是干什么的，他们的盔甲要么是从战场上拾捡拼凑而来，要么是从周围村落里搞来的。\\n\\n他们最重要的作用是在战后搜集战利品、武器以及盔甲，从而推进太平大业。他们配有长矛和盾牌用以自卫，有时会被拉去充数，但是基本没什么打仗的本事，稍有交兵便作鸟兽散。

Text: This infantry gathers equipment dropped or left behind in battle to help their brothers and sisters continue the fight.
All: 这些步兵可以收集战斗中掉落的装备，从而帮助同袍们继续奋勇杀敌

Text: To be the bolt of justice, to spearhead a charge deep into the enemy lines, delivering vengeance for an oppressed people, this is the task of these warriors. \\n\\n These cavalry are one of the few shock cavalry of the Yellow Turbans army.; once they have ploughed into an enemy formation with their spears, they have the armour and the skill to keep fighting, thrusting with enough force to pierce most armour with righteous intensity.
All: 这些勇士的使命便是替天行道，为苍生而战，给与敌人致命一击。\\n\\n 尽管他们并非最强大的冲锋骑兵，但他们在耐力上却更胜一筹。他们不但能手持长枪，用冲锋撕裂敌人的阵型，还身披重甲，能够在近战中坚持奋战，用正义的怒火刺穿敌人的铠甲。
Old: 这些勇士的使命便是替天行道，为苍生而战，给与敌人致命一击。\\n\\n 尽管他们并非最强大的冲锋骑兵，但他们在耐力上却更胜一筹。他们不但能手持长枪，用冲锋撕裂敌人的阵型，还身披重甲，能够在近战中坚持奋战，用正义的怒火刺穿敌人的铠甲。

Text: At the head of charge they draw their spears, driving home with a righteous cry!
All: 冲锋的士兵们握紧了长矛，发出正义的怒吼！
Old: 冲锋的士兵们握紧了长矛，发出正义的怒吼！
Vanilla: 冲锋的士兵们握紧了长矛，发出正义的怒吼！

Text: It is a central tenet of Taoism that the land must be revered and nurtured; it, in turn, will return to us its bounties. Those chosen warriors who receive of nature's boons must use its gifts to pursue those who have contributed to the corruption and destruction plaguing the land. \\n\\n From the boughs of the trees, arrows and crossbows are fashioned and handled by warriors who wield them with greater expertise than most of their contemporaries.
All: 道教的核心思想之一便是敬天爱民，如此方能使天下大治。那些得到上天眷顾的将士们必须将贪官污吏尽数诛灭，才可称之为不辱使命。\\n\\n这些战士们手持木制的弓箭，有着超凡脱俗的精湛弓术。
Old: 道教的核心思想之一便是敬天爱民，如此方能使天下大治。那些得到上天眷顾的将士们必须将贪官污吏尽数诛灭，才可称之为不辱使命。\\n\\n这些战士们手持木制的弓箭，有着超凡脱俗的精湛弓术。
Vanilla: 道教的核心思想之一便是敬天爱民，如此方能使天下大治。那些得到上天眷顾的将士们必须将贪官污吏尽数诛灭，才可称之为不辱使命。\\n\\n这些战士们手持木制的弓箭，有着超凡脱俗的精湛弓术。

Text: Nature must be preserved and the world saved. These warriors will see it done.
All: 这些战士的信念便是拯救天下苍生，他们将为此奋战到底。
Old: 这些战士的信念便是拯救天下苍生，他们将为此奋战到底。
Vanilla: 这些战士的信念便是拯救天下苍生，他们将为此奋战到底。

Text: The Yellow Turban rebellion challenges the corruption that poisons China and has made many question old loyalties. \\n\\n These noblemen have renounced their former warlords to seek justice and redemption. Their previous life of privilege has trained and equipped them well, and they ride into battle clad in ornate armour and helmets upon impressive mounts of the finest stock. \\n\\n With sharp spears, the impact of their charge is merely a way to break the enemy’s lines for deadly close combat.
All: 黄巾军冲击了天下的腐朽势力，许多人都开始有所动摇。\\n\\n这些贵族不再效忠于之前的诸侯，而是另寻天义以求救赎。他们之前生活优渥，自然装备训练充足，他们身着华丽兜鍪骑良马杀入战场，他们手持斧头和盾牌，冲破敌阵后也会近战砍杀。
Old: 黄巾军冲击了天下的腐朽势力，许多人都开始有所动摇。\\n\\n这些贵族不再效忠于之前的诸侯，而是另寻天义以求救赎。他们之前生活优渥，自然装备训练充足，他们身着华丽兜鍪骑良马杀入战场，他们手持斧头和盾牌，冲破敌阵后也会近战砍杀。

Text: Elite cavalry guards who have turned their weapons against their former masters to serve the Yellow Turbans.
All: 背弃前任主公转投黄巾大业的精英骑兵
Old: 背弃前任主公转投黄巾大业的精英骑兵
Vanilla: 背弃前任主公转投黄巾大业的精英骑兵

Mapped by text: 由校尉和卫官来指挥军队。

Text: Heavily-armoured troops carrying iron bows that requires very strong tension.

Mapped by text: 重装部队，携带张力很强的铁弓。

Mapped by text: 佩戴盾与手戟，这些西凉勇士为敌人带来杀身之祸。

All: 即使在沙尘中，他们也总能准确命中。
Mapped by text: 即使在沙尘中，他们也总能准确命中。

Text: Amongst the hills of Jingchu, the unwary may find themselves tripped upon a caltrop, and slain by the man who laid it.
All: 在荆楚的山中，粗心的人可能会被一把蒺藜绊倒，然后被放它的人杀死。
Mapped by text: 在荆楚的山中，粗心的人可能会被一把蒺藜绊倒，然后被放它的人杀死。

Text: Echoing the glory of Chu, the great axes these men wield will make short work of their shielded foes.
All: 这些人所挥的大斧是楚国的荣耀，即使是持盾的敌人亦命不久矣。
Mapped by text: 这些人所挥的大斧是楚国的荣耀，即使是持盾的敌人亦命不久矣。

Text: Stalwart as the hills they were raised in, these Chu spearmen are an asset to any warlord.
All: 这些楚国的矛兵与山丘一样坚韧，对任何一个军阀来说都是一笔财富。
Mapped by text: 这些楚国的矛兵与山丘一样坚韧，对任何一个军阀来说都是一笔财富。

Text: Raining death from afar, the archers of Jingchu have learned well the advantage that the bow brings in hilly terrain.
All: 荆楚弓手早已领悟到了弓箭在丘陵地带的优势。
Mapped by text: 荆楚弓手早已领悟到了弓箭在丘陵地带的优势。

Text: The Yan frontier offers no shortage of good horses. The constant warfare provides these steeds with expert riders.
All: 燕疆不乏良马。连绵的战事为这些战马提供了老练的骑手。
Mapped by text: 燕疆不乏良马。连绵的战事为这些战马提供了老练的骑手。

Text: A charge from a squadron of Spear cavalry is a daunting sight for any soldier. But to see the warriors of Yan descend upon them is a new brand of terror altogether.
All: 对任何一个士兵来说，一队持矛骑兵的冲锋都会令人生畏。但如果杀来的是燕国战士，则是一种全新的恐怖。
Mapped by text: 对任何一个士兵来说，一队持矛骑兵的冲锋都会令人生畏。但如果杀来的是燕国战士，则是一种全新的恐怖。

Text: The Glory of the Han shall endure while these men have the strength to wield their halberds.
All: 只要这些人有力量挥舞他们的战戟，汉室的荣耀就将延续。
Mapped by text: 只要这些人有力量挥舞他们的战戟，汉室的荣耀就将延续。

Text: Whether near or from afar, these soldiers shall bring justice to any who would threaten their prince.
All: 无论远近，这些士卒都要为任何威胁他们主公的人讨回公道。
Mapped by text: 无论远近，这些士卒都要为任何威胁他们主公的人讨回公道。

Text: A prince's retinue reflects their glory in splendour. These brave cavalrymen match their splendour with equal prowress in battle.
These versatile infantry will solve nigh any problem their Wu commanders might face.
All: 这些多能的步兵几乎可以解决吴军将领可能面临的任何问题。
Mapped by text: 这些多能的步兵几乎可以解决吴军将领可能面临的任何问题。

Text: As the enemy spots the blue turbans on the field, they know the hardest fighting is about to begin.
All: 当敌人在战场上看到蓝色头巾时，他们就知道最艰苦的战斗即将开始。
Mapped by text: 当敌人在战场上看到蓝色头巾时，他们就知道最艰苦的战斗即将开始。

Text: An illustrious lineage provides many swords, along with men willing to wield them.
All: 显赫的血统可以使许多剑士愿意效命。
Mapped by text: 显赫的血统可以使许多剑士愿意效命。

Text: Having defended their home for long enough, even militia may grow to rival professional soldiers.
All: 长久保卫家园之后，即使是民兵也可能成长为职业士兵的对手。
Mapped by text: 长久保卫家园之后，即使是民兵也可能成长为职业士兵的对手。

Text: The Han must be restored. These men shall follow their righteous general to the death to see it done.
All: 汉室必须复兴。这些人将誓死跟随他们通晓大义的将军。
Mapped by text: 汉室必须复兴。这些人将誓死跟随他们通晓大义的将军。

Text: The desperate and the disenfranchised gather at the base of Black Mountain, ready to expand their fortunes or die trying.
With club in hand, the desperate shall make a fortune and name for themselves, or die trying.
In the hills and mountains of the Southlands, the desperate will lay down their lives to escape the Han.
Great danger hides in the early mist of day. Phantoms that will maim their prey, or whose choking gass leaves them gasping for air.
The sting of an arrowshaft can be deadly, but with these archers, death may still find you long after the arrow pierced your flesh.
The cragged edges of the southern mountains fashion peasants into warriors, flint-eyed and sharp.
All: 江南险峻陡立的群峰，将山民锻炼成了勇猛精干的战士。
Old: 江南险峻陡立的群峰，将山民锻炼成了勇猛精干的战士。
Vanilla: 江南险峻陡立的群峰，将山民锻炼成了勇猛精干的战士。

Text: Steppe horse archers are in high demand by many warlords. But sometimes they make a better profit by working for themselves.
All: 很多军阀都想要有草原骑射手。但与其为人效命，有时候不如自己单干。
Mapped by text: 很多军阀都想要有草原骑射手。但与其为人效命，有时候不如自己单干。

Text: What kind of men are these, who are not soldiers, yet wear elite armour? Bloody men, who have earned their weaponry through victory and pillaging.
All: 这些人并非军士，却穿着精良的铠甲。他们的装备来自于血腥的胜利和洗劫。
Mapped by text: 这些人并非军士，却穿着精良的铠甲。他们的装备来自于血腥的胜利和洗劫。

Text: These elite, battle-hardened bandits carry an axe in each hand, and advance ahead of the front lines to catch their foes unawares
All: 这些身经百战的精英匪盗双手各执一斧，可在战线前方杀敌之出其不意
Old: 这些身经百战的精英匪盗双手各执一斧，可在战线前方杀敌之出其不意
Vanilla: 这些身经百战的精英匪盗双手各执一斧，可在战线前方杀敌之出其不意

Text: Ingenuity and craftsmanship can turn even a lowly militiaman into a daunting foe.
To break these warriors is the challenge of many an army. So far, very few have succeeded.
All: 不少人都想击溃这些战士，但极少有人成功。
Old: 不少人都想击溃这些战士，但极少有人成功。
Vanilla: 不少人都想击溃这些战士，但极少有人成功。

Text: The jian is a straight, double-edged sword known as the 'Gentleman of Weapons', and considered to be one of the four major weapons alongside the gun, dao and qiang. It takes a year of training before one is considered competent enough to use it, and so only the most skilled swordsmen are equipped with it. \\n\\n The role of the Elite Swordsmen is to hold the line against enemy attacks, and their swordsmanship, heavy armour and gourd shields enable them to do this long after others have fallen to exhaustion.
All: 剑是一种直的双刃武器，人称「百兵之君」，与棍、刀、枪合称四大主兵。要成为有足够能力配备剑的人，至少要经过一年的训练，只有最熟练的剑士才能佩剑上阵。\\n\\n精锐剑兵要防御敌人的攻击，他们剑术精湛，披甲持盾，在其他人精疲力竭后仍能坚守阵线。
Override by key: 剑是一种直的双刃武器，人称「百兵之君」，与棍、刀、枪合称四大主兵。要成为有足够能力配备剑的人，至少要经过一年的训练，只有最熟练的剑士才能佩剑上阵。\\n\\n精锐剑兵要防御敌人的攻击，他们剑术精湛，披甲持盾，在其他人精疲力竭后仍能坚守阵线。

Text: A heavy bow made of iron is not easy to use for ordinary archers. \\n\n The range is rather short due to the strong tension and heavy arrowheads, but the arrows will penetrate the enemy. \\n\n This unit is heavily armed with ironclad, and in close combat, it cuts enemy troops with direct distribution.
All: 沉重的铁弓，对普通弓箭手来说不容易使用。\\n\n由于强大的张力和沉重的箭头，射程很短，但箭头会穿透敌人。\\n\n这只部队装备有铁甲，在近距离战斗中，可以轻易砍杀敌军。

Text: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n The courageous and experienced Xiliang army is the envy of most warlords and the pride of its leaders. After having thrown a spare hand-ji, these men will charge the enemy line, swinging their dagger-axes in one hand while the other holds a shield to parry retaliatory blows.
All: 一边是长城的阴影，另一边是草原各部落，西凉民族必须纪律严明，艰苦奋斗。而西凉士兵则必须加倍做到。\\n\\n勇敢而老练的西凉军是大多数军阀羡慕的对象，也是西凉军将领的骄傲。\\n\\n这些士兵会先投掷一只备用的手戟，然后冲向敌人的防线，一只手挥舞着他们的匕首斧，另一只手拿着盾牌来招架敌人的回击。
Override by key: 一边是长城的阴影，另一边是草原各部落，西凉民族必须纪律严明，艰苦奋斗。而西凉士兵则必须加倍做到。\\n\\n勇敢而老练的西凉军是大多数军阀羡慕的对象，也是西凉军将领的骄傲。\\n\\n这些士兵会先投掷一只备用的手戟，然后冲向敌人的防线，一只手挥舞着他们的匕首斧，另一只手拿着盾牌来招架敌人的回击。

Text: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n The courageous and experienced Xiliang army is the envy of most warlords and the pride of its leaders. \\n\\n These spearmen protect the flanks by pre-empting charges and bracing their qiang spears at an angle, so only the most foolish or brave cavalry dare charge them. This makes them a target for missile attacks, so they are outfitted in leather armour and carry large shields to protect themselves from the expected rain of arrows.
All: 一边是长城的阴影，另一边是草原各部落，西凉民族必须纪律严明，艰苦奋斗。而西凉士兵则必须加倍做到。\\n\\n勇敢而老练的西凉军是大多数军阀羡慕的对象，也是西凉军将领的骄傲。\\n\\n这些矛兵通过先发制人的冲锋来保护侧翼，并以一定角度支起他们的羌族长矛，只有最愚蠢或最勇敢的骑兵才敢向其冲锋。但这使他们成为远程攻击的目标，因此他们装备了皮甲，并携带大型盾牌，以保护自己免受箭雨伤害。

Text: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n The courageous and experienced Xiliang army is the envy of most warlords and the pride of its leaders. \\n\\n These soldiers, armed with the long Ji, will brace and hold against cavalry charges, letting the horse impale itself on their blades. Wearing iron armour, they will wade into the melee confidently and take on all comers.
All: 一边是长城的阴影，另一边是草原各部落，西凉民族必须纪律严明，艰苦奋斗。而西凉士兵则必须加倍做到。\\n\\n勇敢而老练的西凉军是大多数军阀羡慕的对象，也是西凉军将领的骄傲。\\n\\n这些士兵，装备了长戟，将在骑兵冲锋时严阵以待，让马自己冲到他们的刀刃上。他们身穿铁甲，可以自如地加入混战，迎击所有来犯。
Override by key: 一边是长城的阴影，另一边是草原各部落，西凉民族必须纪律严明，艰苦奋斗。而西凉士兵则必须加倍做到。\\n\\n勇敢而老练的西凉军是大多数军阀羡慕的对象，也是西凉军将领的骄傲。\\n\\n这些士兵，装备了长戟，将在骑兵冲锋时严阵以待，让马自己冲到他们的刀刃上。他们身穿铁甲，可以自如地加入混战，迎击所有来犯。

Text: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n The courageous and experienced Xiliang army is the envy of most warlords and the pride of its leaders. \\n\\n Armed with crossbows, these soldiers rain down a hail of armour-piercing missiles on their foes. A wise general will support them with spearmen, as they are a prime target for enemy horsemen.
All: 一边是长城的阴影，另一边是草原各部落，西凉民族必须纪律严明，艰苦奋斗。而西凉士兵则必须加倍做到。\\n\\n勇敢而老练的西凉军是大多数军阀羡慕的对象，也是西凉军将领的骄傲。\\n\\n这些士兵手持弓弩，向敌人发射大量穿甲箭矢。聪明的将军会用矛兵支持他们，因为他们是敌人骑兵的主要目标。

Text: If only strength can rule, then strength must be displayed often and in great abundance. And it must be used to make an example of fools who would believe otherwise. \\n\\n Trained in the Xiliang style of warfare, these disciplined warriors form the backbone of the ironfisted rule that Dong Zhuo and Lu Bu impose upon the Han. Skilled with both the bow and the sword, they habitually patrol the streets to put down any unrest.

Text: Heirs of the old dynasty of Chu, the soldiers bred by this land share its temperament: fierce in battle and loyal to the end. They are a fitting fighting force for any warlord or would-be emperor. \\n\\n These warriors bring caltrops to battle, stunting any enemy advance as the foe perishes on the unseen traps. Any survivors are quickly dealt with by the blades these warriors wield. A skilled general would be wary of archers though: they are lightly armored and carry no shield.
All: 在这片土地上培养出来的士兵是楚国旧王朝的继承人，他们有着共同的气质：斗志昂扬，忠贞不渝。他们是使任何军阀或皇帝适意的战斗力量。\\n\\n这些战士携带蒺藜，设下看不见的陷井来阻碍敌人前进。任何幸存者都会很快被这些战士的利刃处理掉。一个熟练的将军会小心防备弓箭手：他们的盔甲很轻，没有盾牌。

Text: Even as the Han crumbles, embers of its glory remain. These warriors serve the prince of Chenliu, Liu Chong. Clad in gold-lacquered armor, they form a resplendiscent sight on the battlefield, reminding all that the fortunes of the Han have not yet faded while these men stand firm. \\n\\n Gifted with fine armor from their prince, these soldiers expertly wield their halberds in defence of the Han. Advancing on their foe as a disciplined unit, they are a living reminder to the greatness of the Han.

Text: Even as the Han crumbles, embers of its glory remain. These warriors serve the prince of Chenliu, Liu Chong. Should the enemy cavalry think to charge, they are in for an unpleasant surprise: these warriors also wield spears and shields and will not hesitate to strike down any horseman who comes too close!

Text: Even as the Han crumbles, embers of its glory remain. These warriors serve the prince of Chenliu, Liu Chong. Clad in gold-lacquered armor, they form a resplendiscent sight on the battlefield, reminding all that the fortunes of the Han have not yet faded while these men stand firm. \\n\\n These royal guards are a beacon of hope to their allies. Gifted with fine steeds to ride, and clad in the heaviest armour availible from the princely armouries, each man has been trained in a myriad of weapons, from crossbow to the noble Jian sword and shield and is a veteran of many battles.

Text: Treat your men as you would your own beloved sons. And they will follow you into the deepest valley. \\n\\n Serving the heirs of Sun Tzu, these men would willingly follow them into heirs and certain death. Armed with a light glaive and medium armor, these men can hold their own in a variety of situations, facing down cavalry or infantry with equal skill. Their versatility has caused them to be fondly called “problem solvers” by their commanders and are given great respect, which they repay with loyalty.

Move swift as the Wind and closely-formed as the Wood. Attack like the Fire and be still as the Mountain. \\n\\n These elite soldiers hail from Danyang province and are rapidly gaining renown with commanders in the crumbling Han empire. Armed with a glaive and heavy armor, they have gathered a reputation assaulting enemy strongpoints succesfully and routing their defenders. \\n\\n Already, enemies have learned to fear their expertise, as well as the gunpowder bombs they carry with them. When the Blue Turbans have been spotted on the field, the foe knows their days are numbered.

The Yuan clan's fame brings many benefits, one of which the number of men willing to lay down their lives in their service. \\n\\n Wielding the noble Jian blade, and protected by stout shields and good armour, these swordsmen will defend their masters with zeal. They form the frontline of the Yuan battleline, chopping and slashing at their foe until either they or themselves are slain.

With the many wars that ravage China, militias everywhere have sprung up to defend their home and livelihood from bandits, yellow turbans, and invading warlords. Tempered by hard-won experience, these men have become adepts at war by survival.  Equally skilled in melee as with the bow, they over time bought horses to level the playing field with the more professional troops they often face. Many of these veterans now flock to the banners of the warlords, providing a rapid response force fit for a variety of situations.

Recruited by Liu Bei during his time as "General of the Left", these soldiers now are loyal to their general and will fight to see his vision fulfilled. The Han shall be restored, and they will unleash a barrage of arrows upon any rebel who would see the Han extinguished. And And if their foes would close the distance, they shall find that they are equally skilled in melee combat, unless they fight cavalry.

The Yellow Turban rebellion and the rapidly collapsing Han dynasty has left many people without homes or livelihoods. The most desperate or least scrupulous of these turn to banditry. These men flock to the bandit of the king of Black Mountain, hoping to remake their fortunes through plunder and bloody battle. Despite their hopes, their poor equipment usually has them end up as fodder, while others reap the rewards for their sacrifices.
All: 黄巾起义和迅速瓦解的汉朝，使许多人失去了家园和生计。这些人中最绝望或最不谨慎的人都变成了强盗。这些人加入黑山王的土匪，希望通过烧杀掠夺来重获财富。尽管他们抱有希望，但他们糟糕的装备通常让他们只能做挡箭牌，而其他人则会因他们的牺牲而收获回报。

Text: The Yellow Turban rebellion and the rapidly collapsing Han dynasty has left many people without homes or livelihoods. The most desperate or least scrupulous of these turn to banditry. These men flock to the self-proclaimed bandit queen, hoping to remake their fortunes through plunder and bloody battle. Despite their hopes, their poor equipment usually has them end up as fodder, while others reap the rewards for their sacrifices.

Text: Born from refugees and those peoples who would not submit to the Han empire, these White Tiger Strays have thrown their lot with Yan Baihu, hoping to safeguard their independance. Wearing bad equipment, the most valuable thing they offer to their commanders is their lives; to sell dearly as better men win the battle for them.

Text: Whereas some cavalry bring a primal, instantly shattering force to the battlefield, other mounted warriors are suited to the slower burn, embroiling themselves in the melee and staying to continue inflicting casualties. \\n\\n Whilst they get less power on the charge, their destructive capability increases dramatically once they begin hacking away at foes.

The bandit queen's forces are bolstered by the presence of these so-called "phantoms". Hailing from Taishan, these warriors have already gathered an ominous reputation for the poison bombs they carry with them. If the wind is right, these bombs will cause entire regiments to choke without even comitting to battle. They are furthermore armed with a light sword and cloth armor, so they should not be relied on to hold the line in melee.

Hailing from Taishan, these women have coated their arrow points in a special ointment, made from poisonous herbs native to the region. In battle, A volley from these archers will soon leave the enemy gasping for air as the poison very quickly spreads through their veins. A wise commander will use these soldiers to spread terror through the enemy ranks, yet keep them well-protected: they are vulnerable to cavalry, as their range is limited.

Text: Mighty, gnarled monoliths, the imposing peaks of China's south stand like sentinels against the unrelenting waters beyond. Amongst these hills and peaks, the Yue tribes eke out their continued existence; brought low from the once-proud past, they stand now against the threat of Han invasion from the north. Although they wield sword and shield, they are nothing like the professional warriors coming to face them. \\n\\n Yet, united behind one who purports to fight for their ideals, the Yue are able to summon themselves into something resembling their own strength – their legacy demands it!

The nomads of the steppes have a reputation for fine horsemanship. These particular horse archers have turned to banditry and pillaging to fill their coffers. They will allign themselves to bandit chiefs of note, who can afford their services by giving them a proportional share of the loot. In battle, they harass the enemy from afar, using their horses to quickly wheel about when the counter-attack comes.

The typical bandit force consists of lightly armored troops. These men are not a typical bandit force. A string of victories or lucky looting has netted them the excellent armour wielded by the heavy troops of the Han empire. They now form a heavy spear unit, capable of holding their ground against even the dreaded barded horsemen. With these men, any aspiring bandit warlord may find himself a bandit king or queen, one day.

Text: Zheng Jiang has selected her most ferocious bandits to act as her ‘Fists of the Bandit Queen’; their role is to act as shock-troops, sneaking behind enemy lines to terrify foes with surprise attacks early in the battle. \\n\\n Each carries a heavy fu axe in each hand, and the wounds dealt by them can be catastrophic. Striking terror requires these troops to be without fear themselves, but also means they can tend to be undisciplined and difficult to control once their blood is hot with battle

Text: Having fled from their homes, these craftsmen and artisans turn their skills to the defence of their new home and master. \\n\\n Having been selected as the brightest from the many refugees flooding his lands, these engineers serve Tao Qian to the best of their ability. Wielding crossbows, they provide support from afar and will deploy smoke bombs and caltrops when an enemy strays too close. However, these men are not proper soldiers and should not be relied upon to hold the line in melee.

Text: Sun Tzu said that one should always give an enemy room to escape, so that they do not fight with the fervour of the doomed. Yet for Gao Shun's elite force, Xian Chen Ying, being entirely surrounded is nothing but another dimension to slaughter. \\n\\n Renowned for their abilitiy to smash through enemy formations, Xian Chen Ying excel even when surrounded. The bodies will pile high, but Xian Chen Ying will still emerge from the pile victorious.

Override by key: 皇天护军
后土卫军

Text: Sword Guards of the Eight Talents
Ji Guards of the Eight Talents
This unit's arrows spew clouds of deadly gas on impact.
Thunderous sounds and exploding flames agitate the enemy.
All: 以如震天雷响与其火焰爆破震摄敌军。
Old: 以如震天雷响与其火焰爆破震摄敌军。
Exact: 以如震天雷响与其火焰爆破震摄敌军。

Text: This unit can't shoot very far.

All: 他们可对敌人进行挑衅。
Old: 他们可对敌人进行挑衅。
Exact: 他们可对敌人进行挑衅。

Text: These soldiers obey only their own passions. They may charge without orders and act erratically on the battlefield!
All: 这些士兵只遵从自己的喜好。他们可能会在没有命令的情况下擅自冲锋，并在战场上彻底失控！
Old: 这些士兵只遵从自己的喜好。他们可能会在没有命令的情况下擅自冲锋，并在战场上彻底失控！
Vanilla: 这些士兵只遵从自己的喜好。他们可能会在没有命令的情况下擅自冲锋，并在战场上彻底失控！
Exact: 有什么使他们丧失理智。

Text: This unit causes extra damage against shielded enemies.
All: 此部队更擅长对阵持盾敌人。
Old: 此部队更擅长对阵持盾敌人。
Vanilla: 此部队更擅长对阵持盾敌人。

Text: This unit can fire on the move.
All: 他们可以在奔跑时进行射击。
Old: 他们可以在奔跑时进行射击。
Exact: 他们可以在奔跑时进行射击。

Text: This unit's weapon allows it to pierce even the strongest enemy armour.
All: 此单位的武器可以穿透最强的护甲。
Mapped by text: 此单位的武器可以穿透最强的护甲。

Text: Their heavy metal bows are short-ranged but can pierce through enemies.
All: 此弓威力非凡。射程虽短，但具穿甲威力。
Old: 此弓威力非凡。射程虽短，但具穿甲威力。
Exact: 此弓威力非凡。射程虽短，但具穿甲威力。

Text: This unit fires whistling arrows that demoralise enemies along their trajectory.
All: 击射响箭，惊吓所经路径上的敌军。
Old: 击射响箭，惊吓所经路径上的敌军。
Exact: 击射响箭，惊吓所经路径上的敌军。

Text: These fanatics will blow themselves up when they're in a losing battle.
All: 当在近战失利时，此部队将引爆自身。
Old: 当在近战失利时，此部队将引爆自身。
Exact: 当在近战失利时，此部队将引爆自身。

Text: This unit's sticky rosin arrows cling to their targets, making them vulnerable to flames.
All: 击射特殊松香油箭，使目标更易焚烧。
Old: 击射特殊松香油箭，使目标更易焚烧。
Exact: 击射特殊松香油箭，使目标更易焚烧。

Text: Average Hit Rate, High Armour-Piercing Damage
All: 命中率一般，穿甲伤害高
Mapped by text: 命中率一般，穿甲伤害高
Old: Excels at attacking unarmoured opponents, but very vulnerable to cavalry charges.
Exact: Excels at attacking unarmoured opponents, but very vulnerable to cavalry charges.

Old: Excels at attacking unarmoured opponents, but vulnerable to missile attacks.
Exact: Excels at attacking unarmoured opponents, but vulnerable to missile attacks.

Old: Excels at attacking unarmoured opponents, but vulnerable to missile attacks.
Exact: Excels at attacking unarmoured opponents, but vulnerable to missile attacks.

Text: Long Range, Low Armour-Piercing Damage, Fast Reload
All: 远距，穿甲伤害低，射击速率快
Mapped by text: 远距，穿甲伤害低，射击速率快
Old: Excels at wearing down enemies without shields, but vulnerable in melee.
Exact: Excels at wearing down enemies without shields, but vulnerable in melee.

Old: Excels at holding the line especially at chokepoints, but has very low damage.
Exact: Excels at holding the line especially at chokepoints, but has very low damage.

Old: Best used to counter missile units, but vulnerable in melee.
Exact: Best used to counter missile units, but vulnerable in melee.

Text: Average Hit Rate, Average Armour-Piercing Damage
All: 命中率一般，穿甲伤害一般
Mapped by text: 命中率一般，穿甲伤害一般
Old: Excels at head-on assaults against the enemy frontline, but very vulnerable to cavalry charges.
Exact: Excels at head-on assaults against the enemy frontline, but very vulnerable to cavalry charges.

Text: Luxurious robes, fit for those who do not tread the battlefield.

Text: For farmers, they are higher than the emperor.

Text: They get everything down to a note.
Your attendant will replenish the regional army.

Text: This is the basic way to correct corruption.

Text: An imperial ancestral rite is being held...
All: 正在举行皇家祭祀仪式……

Text: It seems you've offended the imperial court...
It seems you've offended the imperial court...

The imperial ancestral rite, a significant event in China, will be held soon. An imperial decree demands that you send civil officials to assist in administrative affairs or military officers for the imperial guard detail. If you fulfill your duties as a faithful servant, the imperial court will grant you grace. If you refuse, you may incurr the emperor's disfavour...
All: 即将举行的皇家祭祀仪式是朝中的一项重大活动。诏书要求您派文官去协助行政事务，或派武官去协助禁卫。如果您尽忠职守，朝廷会给予赏赐。拒不执行，则可能招致天子的不满。
Override by key: 即将举行的皇家祭祀仪式是朝中的一项重大活动。诏书要求您派文官去协助行政事务，或派武官去协助禁卫。如果您尽忠职守，朝廷会给予赏赐。拒不执行，则可能招致天子的不满。

Text: A decree has arrived from the imperial court. A banquet is to be held, and influential nobles from across China are invited to the imperial palace. Wary of our influence, the imperial protector may be plotting something. However, refusing an imperial decree may have grave consequences...
All: 朝廷下达了一道诏书，将在皇宫设宴邀请天下有影响力的贵族。这恐怕是辅政大臣因为担心我们的影响力设下的计谋，但违背诏书可能会有严重后果……
Override by key: 朝廷下达了一道诏书，将在皇宫设宴邀请天下有影响力的贵族。这恐怕是辅政大臣因为担心我们的影响力设下的计谋，但违背诏书可能会有严重后果……

Text: The emperor thinks highly of you. His majesty has decided to gift you a small fortune in honour of your contributions to the state.
All: 天子对你甚有好感，决定给你一些赏赐，来表彰你对朝廷的贡献。
Mapped by text: 天子对你甚有好感，决定给你一些赏赐，来表彰你对朝廷的贡献。

Text: Imperial Favour: A Gift from the Emperor
Perhaps out of admiration or to curry favour, a faction has put in a good word for you with the emperor. Talk of your exploits is is all that is on everyone's lips at the palace of late.
All: 也许是出于钦佩，也许是向您示好，有一派系在皇帝面前为你多加褒词。最近在宫中人人都在谈论您的功绩。
Mapped by text: 也许是出于钦佩，也许是向您示好，有一派系在皇帝面前为你多加褒词。最近在宫中人人都在谈论您的功绩。

Text: Slander! A rival warlord is spreading malicious rumours at the imperial court, causing Emperor Xian to doubt our loyalty to the Han.
All: 诽谤！一个敌对的军阀在朝廷散布恶意的谣言，使献帝怀疑我们对大汉的忠诚。
Mapped by text: 诽谤！一个敌对的军阀在朝廷散布恶意的谣言，使献帝怀疑我们对大汉的忠诚。

All: 皇家宴会结束，并无意外发生
Mapped by text: 皇家宴会结束，并无意外发生

Text: Fortunately, nothing of note happened during the banquet.

Text: The imperial ancestral rite ended without incident. Unfortunately, the emperor returned to the place without acknowledging your contribution.
All: 皇家祭祀仪式顺利完成，但天子一言不发便回宫了。
Mapped by text: 皇家祭祀仪式顺利完成，但天子一言不发便回宫了。

Text: A cowardly conspiracy! There was a failed attempt to assassinate you during the banquet. Unfortunately, the assaliant was slain by the guards before he could be made to reveal the conspirator's identity.
All: 阴谋！有人于宴会中欲加害于你。事虽未成，但刺客已被护卫弑杀，无法得知是谁在背后主谋。

Text: The imperial ancestral rite was completed successfully, and the emperor shows favour to the attending nobles.

Text: Selecting this will open the Imperial Intrigue panel, which governs all the mechanics which become active once Emperor Xian comes of age in 195 CE, introducing a struggle over the influence of the new imperial power.
